name: Suburban Scavengers (itch)
description:
Ever see a couch on the side of the road that you thought about stopping and picking up? Have you ever stopped to pick that couch up and somebody else stopped to pick it up at the same time and you had to bounce off of the couch and ELBOW DROP them?

THEN THIS IS THE PERFECT GAME FOR YOU!

Suburban Scavengers is a tug of war style fighting game where you're a hipster trying to get a garbage couch into your house. It's like Nidhogg and Divekick had a lovechild and that child wanted free, garbage furniture.

Battle as a hipster, resting b**** face, or a mall santa over couch supremacy!

*This game requires a controller to play
